title: Earth Mama Love Kitchen Collective
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Juice and food bar opened Jun 2015 inside Green Soul Organics downtown. Co-operatively owned and run. Serves plant-based meals, cold pressed juices, smoothies, elixers, house blended apothecary teas, and treats such as raw chocolate and bliss balls. Aims to run a zero waste kitchen and as such encourage customers to bring their own containers or use one of its reusable containers on a deposit system.
